tweet: A surprise snowfall today.  The view of the trees encased in snow on the Palisades, the intervening snow softening the scene, beautiful.
Went to the Morgan Library in NYC last night.  This is a small jewel of a museum.  Well worth a visit.
Had lunch with the Regent Seven Seas account rep.  Some fantastic bargains being offered.  Look for completely free shore excursions in 2010
Just submitted my first article to Idea Marketers.  Big step for me.  I'm psyched.
Star Clipper is offering free air from LA for select sailings on Star Flyer in Tahiti, including sailings in Jun, Jul & Aug - the best time.
